transcript: Keep kidding? We just got here, we'd miss it. What's the point of coming all the way out of here? We're just gonna turn around and go home.

segments.text: Keep kidding? We just got here, we'd miss it.
What's the point of coming all the way out of here? We're just gonna turn around and go home.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Are you kidding?  We just got here, we'd miss it.  What's the point of coming all the way out here if we're just going to turn around and go home?
